RelatedSentence: Joint Base Elmendorf - Richardson , Alaska - A woman has been hospitalized in stable condition after being attacked by a brown bear on an Alaska military base .
The Anchorage Daily News newspaper reports the woman suffered lacerations to her neck , arms and legs .
The Anchorage Daily News newspaper reports the woman suffered lacerations to her neck , arms and legs .
Authorities say the woman and her husband were running on base .
The woman got ahead of her husband , and encountered a sow with two cubs nearby .

A1: a brown bear on an Alaska military base
RelatedSentence: She saw the bear and dropped to the ground , playing dead .
She saw the bear and dropped to the ground , playing dead .
Maj. Angela Webb says the bear came up to the woman and swiped at her with a paw .
Base officials have closed all recreational trails near the attack site as they investigate .
